body_html:
I also tried to comment the "contrib.deprecated". But this leads to another error message saying"
File "/d2/fpengaa/work/learntf/lstm-ptb/reader.py", line 100, in ptb_producer with tf.name_scope(name, "PTBProducer", [raw_data, batch_size, num_steps]):
TypeError: name_scope() takes exactly 1 argument (3 given)
Moreover, I used to get another error saying
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'ptb_producer'
I learned that to rectify this error, I have to change the import:
from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader
to
import reader
Then I succeeded in rectifying the last error. Though this error seems not related to my current question, it did make me to think whether it is because the code in the github repository has been updated by the developers but the tutorial has not been updated accordingly. Since the problem happens on the "import" is obviously because the version has been changed, not because the implementation has errors.
Anyway, thank you all for helping me, and should you have some progress in solving this problem, please kindly share your solution.
Thank you very much!!!

body:
I also tried to comment the "contrib.deprecated". But this leads to another error message saying"
`File "/d2/fpengaa/work/learntf/lstm-ptb/reader.py", line 100, in ptb_producer
    with tf.name_scope(name, "PTBProducer", [raw_data, batch_size, num_steps]):`
`TypeError: name_scope() takes exactly 1 argument (3 given)`
Moreover, I used to get another error saying 
`AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'ptb_producer'`
I learned that to rectify this error, I have to change the import:
`from tensorflow.models.rnn.ptb import reader`
to
`import reader`
Then I succeeded in rectifying the last error. Though this error seems not related to my current question, it did make me to think whether it is because the code in the github repository has been updated by the developers but the tutorial has not been updated accordingly. Since the problem happens on the "import" is obviously because the version has been changed, not because the implementation has errors.
Anyway, thank you all for helping me, and should you have some progress in solving this problem, please kindly share your solution.
Thank you very much!!!
